features:
Contagrip® FD: 
Designed for adhesion on wet or smooth surfaces, Contagrip® FD uses flat and sometimes siped lugs, with a highly durable compound.

Sipping: 
Perforated grooves on the outsole improve friction on wet and flat rock surfaces.

EnergyCell: 
A high performance EVA foam that provides shock attenuation.

Single layer Mesh: 
A single layer of Mesh, close to the foot, for maximum feel.

Synthetic upper: 
Synthetic upper material provide great durability and protection for outdoor activities.

Recycled material:
Materials made from recycled products such as PET bottles or material waste

Adjustable heel strap: 
Adjustable heel strap for secure, comfortable heel hold.

Lace pocket: 
Provides easy storage for the Quicklace™ lacing system.

SensiFit™: 
SensiFit™ cradles the foot from the midsole to the lacing system, providing a secure, snug, and virtually customized fit all around the foot.

Welded collar binding: 
Seamless collar construction for improved comfort.

Protective mudguard: 
A wrap of leather, synthetic or rubber around the base of the foot that protects the lateral and medial sides of the foot.

EVA sockliner: 
A simple but effective EVA sockliner that offers great cushioning and comfort, instantly.
